group_1.textRight: By all means, you delivered a beautiful performance.
How one's voice, refined through repeated practice,@could resonate so freely and expansively.
The mixed chorus was also wonderful, but I@much preferred your solo singing.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Jeez, that's a bit embarrassing...!@Thank you very much! ♪

group_1.textRight: Truly, I was moved by your earnesty.

group_1.narration: "Now, up here on stage, we're already@halfway through the show!"
"Just to give you a quick reminder, after this@there will be a discussion with the director of the@Folklore Museum in Yukuni and a scholar of folklore."
"Following that, there will be a diabolo performance@by Urara and I, and then it'll be time for our@on-site Nightlife Homeroom!"
"This time, it's not just us talking.@We've also prepared a segment for some@invited guests to join us!"
"Will it be about that stuff you're into these days, Urara?"
"That's right,@for the students in Yukuni who should be familiar,@I've managed to make contact with those Magical Girls@and they're gonna join us as guests, you know!"
"I hope everyone won't miss this chance to@witness an urban legend become reality!"
"Also, today we'll be announcing the results of the@content ranking from the Festival voting,@so be sure to attend your Homeroom period!"
"Now, let's welcome our two great professors to the stage!"

group_1.textCenter: Hello everyone, I'm the director of the Yukuni@Municipal Folklore Museum.
If you're a student from this town, you may know@me from a field trip or the like.
I am pleased to be here with you today.

group_1.textRight: My name is Tasuke Satomi.@I am a researcher specializing in folklore.
When I mentioned that I was going to visit the@town today, the director invited me to participate.
I've been asked to join you for an impromptu discussion.
I look forward to working with you all.
Well, you seemed uncharacteristically surprised@by that...

group_1.textLeft: I just thought he looked a little like someone I know.

group_1.textRight: Did you feel that too, Himuro-dono and@Sasha-dono...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that was the magical signature for a couple@Witches. Moreover...
No matter how you look at it...@It's definitely a Witch's Labyrinth...

group_1.textRight: ...The magical power we felt from them and@the reaction of these Witches are the same...

group_1.textLeft: In other words, these Witches are definitely that@pair of Magical Girls...

group_1.textRight: The two whose transformations into Witches@we witnessed...

group_1.textLeft: They have managed to survive without being@knocked down by anyone.

group_1.textRight: We have a little time left before we have to@appear as guests.
Let's take them down before they cause any harm@to the Festival.

group_1.textLeft: Let's get in touch with the other Magical Girls.
